page.title: 08HOUSING
page.content: {HOUSING Pershore is a mixture of detached, semi_detached, terraced and farmhouses. There are a few very old houses down{Broad Street and Bridge {Street}which date back to the eighteenth century. These houses are Tudor with Georgian Facades on the road side. When some of the Abbey was knocked down the stone was used to build houses. People have found statues from the Abbey in their garages and houses. There are some modern flats in Pershore and{old folks}are well provided for in sheltered accommoda_ tion. There is an extensive Council Estate at Abbey Park and three large Private Estates. In rural areas the growers have large detached houses or bungalows with their land attached.
